text: David William George Chidgey, Baron Chidgey (9 July 1942 – 15 February 2022) was a British Liberal Democrat politician. He was Member of Parliament (MP) for Eastleigh from 1994 to 2005. He became a member of the House of Lords in 2005. Chidgey died on 15 February 2022, at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:Liberal Democrats (UK) MPs Category:Politicians from Hampshire Category:Liberal Democrat Life Peers
title: David Chidgey, Baron Chidgey
